title: Alias for columns not reflected in Expression Builder
OB: After setting an alias for a column in a dataset, the Expression Builder still displays the old column name when selecting the dataset.
EB: When an alias is set for a column in a dataset, the Expression Builder should display the updated alias name instead of the old column name when selecting the dataset.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Create a new datasource and add a dataset.
2. Set an alias for the first column in the dataset to 'column1'.
3. Insert a data item and bind it to the dataset.
4. Open the Expression Builder and select the dataset. The Expression Builder should display 'column1' instead of the original column name.
